meta.title: Introducing Dragonfly Container Image Service
meta.description: Announcing Dragonfly container image service to greatly improve container startup pulling speed and image access security.
meta.author: Peng Tao, Liu Bo

meta.title: Dragonfly adoption in DCOS of China Mobile Group Zhejiang Co., Ltd
meta.description: This article mainly describes Dragonfly's implementation in the container cloud platform (DCOS) at China Mobile Group Zhejiang Co., Ltd to resolve problems in the large-scale cluster scenario, such as low distribution efficiency, low success rate, and difficult network bandwidth control. In addition, Dragonfly upgraded its features and established high availability deployment based on feedback from the DCOS platform to the community.
meta.author: Chen Yuanzheng, Wang Miaoxin

meta.title: Containerd Accepted Nydus-snapshotter
meta.keywords: dragonfly, container image, OCI, nydus, nydus-snapshotter, containerd
meta.description: Announcing Containerd accepted nydus-snapshotter as a sub-project
meta.author: Changwei Ge

meta.title: Dragonfly 发布 Nydus 容器镜像加速服务
meta.description: Dragonfly 发布 Nydus 容器镜像加速服务,提供容器极速启动能力。
meta.author: 彭涛, 刘博

meta.title: 浙江移动容器云基于 Dragonfly 的统一文件分发平台生产实践
meta.description: 浙江移动容器云（DCOS）平台以 Dragonfly 为改革“利器”，成功解决了运营商大规模集群场景下分发效率低、成功率低以及网络带宽控制难等问题；并反哺社区，在 Dragonfly 界面功能、生产高可用部署层面对 Dragonfly 进行了升级。
meta.author: 陈远峥, 王淼鑫
